title: Platinum Games Isn't Sold On NFTs... Yet  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.17.22
description:
Go to http://upstart.com/KINDAFUNNY to find out how much Upstart can lower your monthly payments!

Go to http://greenchef.com/kindafunny130 and use code KINDAFUNNY130 to get $130 off plus free shipping!

Tim and Tam talk about Platinum Games' skepticism towards NFTs, Elden Ring spoilers, Street Fighter x Magic The Gathering, And More

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:28 - Housekeeping
This morning, the one and only Nitro Rifle, Andy Cortez, posted his first hour of gameplay for Horizon Forbidden West on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames!
Keep your eyes and ears locked to youtube.com/KindaFunny and the Screencast podcast feed because the Peacemaker finale review will be up later today.
Lock On Volume 3 - https://bit.ly/3GY1S4L
